Name: Bad Mojos
About the game: THE MOJOS ARE COMING! You are the last survivor, badmojos attacked the city.Bad mojos is Voodoo dolls with one single objective, to destroy all life and only in your power to stop them. Today is a bad day for badmojos. Take a gun in your hand and start to protect the city from evil voodoo. Grab your canon and help annihilate these angry little Mojos before they take over the city! Select between 3 levels: normal, hard and NIGHTMARE MODE. Each level has its own atmosphere and mood. The player will have to face bad weather conditions on a high level of difficulty. Download now to immerse yourself in this 3D VR shooter environment, and get the Mojos before they get you!
